item.title: Google's Professional Cloud Security Engineer Certification
item.description: Introduction # Earlier this year, my team was provided access to a training budget for Google Cloud Platform that we could use in various ways to purchase classroom trainings or licenses to Google’s on-demand training platform, Cloud Skills Boost as well as a number of exam vouchers that could be used on various GCP certification exams.

item.title: Automatically tagging resources in AWS with Owner Information
item.description: Background # One of AWS’ best practices for building and managing infrastructure in the cloud is to use consistent, accurate tags for the purposes of cost management, correct owner attribution (during operations and security incidents), and even attribute-based access control.

item.title: Building on GCP
item.description: Recently, I had to complete a project that involved running the open source tool Cloudquery to create an inventory of resources in a GCP organization.

item.title: AWS re:Invent 2022 Security Recap
item.description: The annual AWS re:Invent conference has come and gone.

item.title: MongoDB World 2022 Talk: Look Ma, No Public IP!
item.description: Disclaimer: I am a MongoDB employee, and this is a lightning talk I gave at MongoDB World 2022.

item.title: Tracking Temperature and Humidity at Home with Time Series Data
item.description: Disclaimer: I am a MongoDB employee.

item.title: Building Event Driven Experiences with MongoDB Realm and AWS
item.description: Disclaimer: I am a MongoDB employee.
